description: Contact times for internally enrolled students will be arranged at the commencement of semester, via Blackboard or email. The course will involve participation in a scientific research project & the writing of a report on the project & a commentary describing implications of the project for possible investigations in the classroom. Students should contact the Course Coordinator prior to the commencement of semester to discuss the project. This course may not be offered internally if the enrolment is less than ten students.
